name: KeyTrade
description: Pushes warning messages to the right of screen to avoid vertical scrolling when entering data in transfer forms. Set some color font to blue instead of light blue.
additional_info:
Versions
1.07: background red for modifying "virement"
1.06: color blue instead of light blue
1.05: color blue instead of light blue
1.04: Minor fixes
1.03: Fixed message icon that was overlapped by message itself
1.02: Fixed width 140px for message warning to avoid tall messages
1.01: Changed domain to url-prefix to limit to bank transfers (eg: Zoomit messages are not affected)
1.00: First
